data.text: Yona wɔ apataa no yam no, ɔbɔɔ Awurade ne Nyankopɔn mpae se,
Na mekae se, ‘Woapam me afi wʼanim;
Nsu a abu afa me so no bɔɔ me hu,
Memem kɔɔ mmepɔw no ase pɛɛ;
“Bere a me nkwa resen akɔ no,
“Wɔn a wɔde wɔn ho bata ahoni huhuw ho no
Na afei, Awurade hyɛɛ apataa no ma ɔfee Yona too asase so.
